src:
Menang 3-1 Lawan Timor Leste, Timnas U-19 di Puncak Klasemen Grup
06 Nov 2019, 13:53 by Irsyan Hasyim (Kontributor), Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tim Nasional Indonesia U-19 atau Timnas U-19 mengawali kiprahnya di ajang Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 dengan baik. Skuat asuhan Fakhri Husaini ini menang 3-1 atas Timor Leste U-19 pada laga pertama di Stadion Madya, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu malam, 6 November 2019.
Muhammad Fajar Fathur mencetak dua gol pada menit ke-2 dan menit ke-77. Kapten Timnas U-19, David Maulana menyumbang satu gol pada menit ke-62. Selain mencetak dua gol, Fajar Fathur juga membuat assist untuk gol David.
Satu-satunya gol Timor Leste diciptakan oleh Mouzinho De Lima melalui tendangan penalti pada menit ke-51. Timor Leste mendapat hadiah tendangan penalti setelah kiper Timnas U-19, Ernando Ari Sutaryadi, dinilai melakukan pelanggaran di kotak penalti ketika menghalau pergerakan pemain Timor Leste.
Dalam laga ini Timnas Indonesia diuntungkan dengan keungulan pemain, setelah pemain Timor Leste Nelson Pinto diganjar kartu merah karena melakukan pelanggaran terhadap Bagus Kahfi.
Pada laga berikutnya, Timnas U-19 akan menghadapi Hongkong di Stadion Madya, Gelora Bung Karno, pada Jumat, 8 November 2019. Sebelumnya Hongkong bermain imbang 1-1 melawan Korea Utara.
Kemenangan pada laga pertama ini membuat Timnas U-19 berada di puncak klasemen sementara Grup K dengan 3 poin. Di urutan kedua dan ketiga ditempati Korea Utara dan Hongkong yang sama-sama mengumpulkan 1 poin. Sedangkan juru kunci diisi oleh Timor Leste dengan 0 poin.

IRSYAN HASYIM
text:
Win 3-1 Against East Timor, U-19 national team at the top of the Group Standings
Nov 6, 2019, 13:53 by Irsyan Hasyim (Contributor), Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 National Team or U-19 National Team started their work in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup well. Fakhri Husaini's squad won 3-1 over East Timor U-19 in the first match at Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday night, November 6, 2019.
Muhammad Fajar Fathur scored two goals in the 2nd minute and 77th minute. U-19 national team captain, David Maulana contributed one goal in the 62nd minute. Besides scoring two goals, Fajar Fathur also made assists for David's goal.
The only goal of East Timor was created by Mouzinho De Lima through a penalty kick in the 51st minute. Timor Leste was awarded the penalty kick after the U-19 national team goalkeeper, Ernando Ari Sutaryadi, was judged to have committed a foul in the penalty box when fending off the movement of East Timorese players.
In this match the Indonesian national team benefited from the players' superiority, after the East Timor player Nelson Pinto was rewarded a red card for committing a violation of Bagus Kahfi.
In the next match, the U-19 national team will face Hong Kong at the Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno, on Friday, November 8, 2019. Previously, Hong Kong played a 1-1 draw against North Korea.
Victory in this first game makes the U-19 national team at the top of the standings in Group K with 3 points. In second and third place is occupied by North Korea and Hong Kong who both collect 1 point. Whereas the caretaker was filled by Timor Leste with 0 points.

IRSYAN HASYIM
